content:
From: Walther Neuper <wneuper@ist.tugraz.at>
The theories and ML-files of our project are managed in a session Isac,
which creates a heap with the same name.

Now we try to make installation easy for users such that they

create an Isabelle standard installation

copy the Isac binary to the place where the Pure- and HOL-binaries reside.

Can this be done in Isabelle2013-2? If yes, how?

Walther
